name: Tormater 3D
description:
Tormater 3D is a snazzy first-person shooter with the added bonus of Tormater. It's lightweight, fun, and runs on any computer from the last decade or so.

Controls:

  • Move camera: Mouse
  • Fire weapon: LMB
  • Secondary fire weapon: RMB
  • Change weapon: Mouse Scroll
  • Move character: W, A, S, and D
  • Use switches/open doors: Space
  • Pause game: ESC

System Requirements:

  • Dual-core 2.4GHz 64-bit processor
  • A dedicated GPU from 2012 or later, or integrated from 2016 or later
  • 4 GBs of RAM

Operating System Requirements (for pre-compiled binaries):

  • Windows Vista or newer
  • Debian 11 or newer

Do note that you can compile GZDoom for any platform, such as Mac OS or an older Linux distro, so the above list only applies to the pre-compiled game versions.
